title: Capsule Corp Hoodie
body_html:
• Unleash your inner hero with the Capsule Corp Hoodie, inspired by the iconic brand from the Dragon Ball universe. This hoodie features a stylish print, a turn-down collar, and a comfortable blend of polyester and cotton. Perfect for streetwear, casual outings, or adding a touch of anime flair to your wardrobe.

    ✨ Features:

    • Premium polyester and cotton blend for a soft, comfortable feel
    • Capsule Corp logo print for a bold, anime-inspired look
    • Hip Hop style with a modern, relaxed fit
    • Turn-down collar for added style and versatility
    • Hooded design provides extra warmth and casual appeal
    • Standard thickness ideal for all-season wear
    • Available for men, perfect for casual outfits or anime fans

    Package Includes:

    •  1 x Capsule Corp Hoodie
